quest_description: Juggle fruits! (1p per fruit)
Roll down a hill (1p per person)
Have a race up sankt hans backar (1p per person)
Paint your nails in your student council colour (1p per person)
Recycle cans/bottles (panta) (1p for every 4th can)
Wear your lab coat to a lecture (1p per person)
High Five with a pizza baker - (points for different pizza bakers)
Hug a counselor (kurator, nation or not) – (points after the number of counselors)
Bathe in a fountain - (points for different fountains) (Not Lundagård)
Work out at the outdoor gym in winter clothing
Perform a spex on Spexarevägen
Bribe mentors with a cake
Make posters for a non-existing course
Be BFFs with a professor
Take pictures of a student dormitory (points after how gross it looks)
If Finn exists, find Finn
Create a massive lab coat
Fence with the bulls
Forage for Potatoes
Question middle school students about what is ''cool'' in school playgrounds in Lund today
Build a human pyramid
Sing a song to one of the full timers from the song book
Write ''Luna'' with new students, score after the size
Bug with a BUG. (Can not be performed by BUG)
Pherform ''Physical'' physically with a physicist. (Can not be performed by GLUFS)
Feed a mathematician. (Can not be performed by LEMUR)
Bury a geologist (as long as they get air). (Can not be performed by SNYS)
Adopt a pet rock
Go sledding down Sölvegatan (Fysicum to Kalmar Nation)
Obtain a saber (sabel) and acquire a horse

The cake is a lie!

Solve a math problem(high difficulty!!), in a sandbox
Play a kids show anthem on glass bottles

Prove that the high ground is superior
Order a Royal with cheese
Become a shooting star
Find an old member of the Mentor Committee (GoDs)
Perform photoception (the more the better)

Preach about the ”Santa religion” at Stortorget
Eat tuna at Tunavägen

Hang up your own painting in a museum
Bake LUNA buns
Find the building that changes colour
Find the Student Health Centre (you don't have to book an appointment and don't bring the mascot inside)
Dance ringdance in Stortorget, Mårtenstorget and Clemenstorget! (Preferably simultaneously)
Consume sugar outside the sugar mill
Drink the red drink from Shell (or Circle K)
Burn red houses, hit little children and say bad words (Note, do not break the law!)
Explore the faculty, find all student council rooms!

Hold the door
Spell out your team's name with new students
Capture a Pokemon Gym with a Pokemon with your team's name

Go super Saiyan!!! (extra points for high power levels)

Say “our team is going to win this fucking competition” in Dutch to Benji

Show Marwan your best excersise move and have him rate it

Spot a cryptid

Be an adventurer, and then take an arrow to the knee
Chubby bunny with something other than marshmellows

Interpret your horoscope literally for a day
Convince a stranger that today is Friday (Can't be done on a Friday)
Become a Disney princess

Find something forgotten

Draw the chemical structure of Maiotoxin on a blackboard
Discover a new element

Show us how you would react when something is ”orimligt”
Do something mediocre

Make me go ugh/eww/wow
Do a conga line in the stadspark
Eat the domkyrka

Eat the best lunda falafel

Put some lipstick on a statue / pimp a statue
Find your student council room and make a cup of tea
Take a selfie with the LUNA president
Take a selfie with the LUNA vice president
Take a selfie with the LUNA HCR
Make up a sport and get outsiders to participate and compete. (At least 3 people must attend)
Raise your team's flag in a flagpole - (points for various flagpoles)
Bring your mascot to the lecture, it needs one!
Eat brunch at the lecture
Travel back to the future
Explore the Underworld (Say hi to Hades)
Explore Heaven (Say hi to Zeus)

Re-Construct the game show ''Hur gör djur?''

HARDCORE PARKOUR!

Build something related your theme in LEGO

Synchronized berry picking as sport
Find the most inventive way to use a potato

Find something in Lake-lake and sell it

Make a sacrifice to Anders And
Oh no! The boat is sinking and the rations are getting soaked! What should you do?
Perform a psychological experiment (on a psychology student)
Find a philosopher and bombard them with all sorts of paradoxes until they intend to engage in violence on you personally

Wear all 6 different kinds of lab coats at once
Does Uppsala exist?

Yodel in a store
Play a known scene from a drama to the public
Equip the world with hipster glasses
Make a Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster
Fight the pollen!
Rant for 5 minutes about something completely meaningless
Make a trailer film for your student council(s). (At least 2 minutes)

Stay the night outside the lecture hall (OBS! Not inside a university building)
Build any university building from lollipops
Assassinate the LUNA president/ vice president during office hours

Be a youtube celebrity (minimum 302 views) must be from the novisch period
Run a Marathon-race
Recreate a Disney movie in 30 seconds
Take the subway between the Maths building and the Maths Annex (There is an actual tunnel going between the two buildings that you have to find)
Perform mini sitting by Sjön Sjön (amount studentity* rewarded) * (student identity - a way of measuring how much of a student you are)
With one foot in Småland (Please note, not the nation, not the beer...)
Accelerate by the accelerator

Discover the secrets of Area 51
Give FU mustard
Become an influencer
Scientifically prove a conspiracy theory
Hold a powerpoint presentation about your very unusual thesis
Get your team to the top ten most liked pictures with #studyingscienceinlund on instagram
Eat a banana at bananparken, a pear at päronvägens lekplats, an apple at äpplehagen and a nectarine at nektarinlekplatsen
Find all infinity stones
Write a love letter to LUNA
Have an elevator picnic!
Drive the alligators out of Skåne
Find a GoD and give them cheese
Recreate the "running through doors" scenes from Scooby-Doo
Dance "små grodorna" around strangers
Go to the "spritbolag" with a fake beard

Wear an ice cream like a hat
Battle your mentors in bear pong
Make a song about LUNA or FU and sing it at the Central station
Celebrate someone's birthday at a sitting or event

Take a picture in a fountain like friends
Sing stad i ljus at a club
Take a picture with the all the fulltimers in the same picture
Create sculptures of the generals (life-size)

Create and host a DnD adventure with LUNA as a main part of it
Become a meme
Flip a coin forever
Break the 4th wall
Walk along the tram track from Lund C to ESS (each stop is required) (not ON the track, stay safe)
Give a board to every member of the LUNA board (points only if you find them all)
Make a (alcohol free) drink worthy of FU
Perform miracles
Publish a scientific article during the novisch period
Freshen up Lake-lake
Ask a scientific question to a relevant faculty employee, that you can solve, but they can not
Beat Loves Super Mario Odyssey speedrun

Create a tradition
Find a doppelganger to each person in FU
Get witnessed

Design a new patch! (CC the email to naringsliv@luna.lu.se )
